title: Habits

Slide 3
#| echo: false
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "expand for full code"

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

x = np.random.rand(77) 

plt.hist(x, bins=20, label='Random Data', color='pink', alpha=0.7)

plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Frequency')
plt.title('Histogram of Random Data')
plt.legend()

plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

x = np.random.rand(77) 

plt.hist(x, bins=20, label='Random Data', color='pink', alpha=0.7)

plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Frequency')
plt.title('Histogram of Random Data')
plt.legend()

plt.show()

climate change will influence may people including everyone
